english.segment1: Oh Lord my God in You I put my trust. Oh Lord my God in You I put my hope. Oh Lord my God in You I put my trust. Oh Lord my God in You I put my hope
english.segment2: CHORUS: In You In You I find my peace. In You In You I find my strength. In You I live and move and breathe. Let everything I say and do. Be founded by my faith in You. I lift up holy hands and sing. Let the praises ring!
english.segment3: Oh Lord my God to You I give my hands. Oh Lord my God to You I give my feet. Oh Lord my God to You I give my everything. Oh Lord my God to You I give my life
